actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."new_onboards" SET
		"business_name" = '{{update_form.fieldState.business_name.isVisible ? update_form.formData.business_name : update_form.sourceData.business_name}}',
		"business_owner_name" = '{{update_form.fieldState.business_owner_name.isVisible ? update_form.formData.business_owner_name : update_form.sourceData.business_owner_name}}',
    "estimated_volume" = '{{update_form.fieldState.estimated_volume.isVisible ? update_form.formData.estimated_volume : update_form.sourceData.estimated_volume}}',
		"product_category_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.product_category_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.product_category_id : update_form.sourceData.product_category_id}}',
		"phone" = '{{update_form.fieldState.phone.isVisible ? update_form.formData.phone : update_form.sourceData.phone}}',
		"website" = '{{update_form.fieldState.website.isVisible ? update_form.formData.website : update_form.sourceData.website}}',
		"created_at" = '{{update_form.fieldState.created_at.isVisible ? update_form.formData.created_at : update_form.sourceData.created_at}}',
		"updated_at" = '{{update_form.fieldState.updated_at.isVisible ? update_form.formData.updated_at : update_form.sourceData.updated_at}}',
		"business_team_user_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.business_team_user_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.business_team_user_id : update_form.sourceData.business_team_user_id}}',
		"competitor_id" = '{{update_form.fieldState.competitor_id.isVisible ? update_form.formData.competitor_id : update_form.sourceData.competitor_id}}',
		"status" = '{{update_form.fieldState.status.isVisible ? update_form.formData.status : update_form.sourceData.status}}'
	WHERE "id" = {{data_table.selectedRow.id}};
